entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH, Kamouraska
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:18 a.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this morning. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
